column4: hey all, i'm thinking about switching my one desktop to Ubuntu but I am not a big fan of Unity... is there any way to use Gnome2 like came default in 10.10 with the newer revisions like 11.04, 11.10 or the upcoming 12.04 LTS?  I just prefer Gnome2
Just install 10.04, it's LTS and will be supported 'til 2013.
I haven't tried 11.10 yet, has unity changed much since 11.04?
yeah or just say the heck with it and keep a 10.10 installation hjehe
